text: @senatemajldr @BretBaier Trump and McConnell will go down as two of the most infamous fuck-ups in world history. Trump’s failure to respond to the COVID-19 threat in Jan and Feb has directly caused economic devastation and mass fatalities. No rewriting history, no diverting attention from that reality.
